news_header: Dean Forbes, a former homeless teenager turned multimillionaire entrepreneur, has been named the most influential black Briton in the Powerlist 2025.
news_text: Dean Forbes, who experienced homelessness twice as a teenager, has risen to become a multimillionaire entrepreneur and the chief executive of several software companies, including Forterro. After a failed attempt at becoming a professional footballer, he started his career in a call center, eventually accumulating significant wealth through equity stakes in various firms. Despite his success, Forbes emphasizes the importance of his humble beginnings and aims to inspire others from underserved communities through his philanthropic work with the Forbes Family Group. He has been recognized as the top influential black Briton in the Powerlist 2025, reflecting his commitment to providing role models and opportunities for young black individuals.
